desc: Let your kids’ imagination run wild with our stackable modular play sofa. Offers endless possibilities for active play. Also folds up nicely when not in use. 100% mom-and-dad approved!

layout.text: It's a world of our own!
Butter Stacks play couch is designed for kids to play, build and lounge in. It’s hours of fun, safe and imaginative play. Indoor playtime will never be boring again!
